But Thursday's announcement clarifies their individual roles`` so there's clear responsibility and accountability at the top of the company.'' leave in 2011. When Barack Obama was a candidate`` and during the transition period, various conversations were held within the staff, but nothing was of interest to me,'' Colin Powell said. I would rather be someone the George W. Bush calls on from time to time for personal advice, without me expecting anything in return or asking for a position, Colin Powell said. On Afghanistan, Colin Powell said the 30,000 additional U.S. troops Barack Obama authorized in December 2009 haven't turned the war decisively yet. The last of the additional troops arrived in October.
